OOC: Sorry for breaking the maximum fire rule. this is the modified post.

::Jetstorm dodges the optic blasts, but the laser blasts hit his chest.  He 
dodges the dark flame rocket, but Gets hit by the dark heat blasts. He fired 
18 rapid fire optic blasts at Nemises Enforcer, 12 energy blasts at Dark One, 
12 at Astral, and 12 at Fenox.  Sharpedge shoots the grenades to destroy 
them, but only one is destroyed.  The other one hit his foot, and destroyed 
it.  he gets hit in the leg by the gatling guns.  Now limping, he fires 1 
missle up at Scattershot, and 1 at Recklessa::
